tweet:
Cannot stop thinking about Natasha Narwal. She lost her father. Couldn't see him in his last moments. Still in Tihar jail for resisting against a genocidal bill. 

Praying for her and all political prisoners. May Allah end their pains and sufferings. 

More power to you, Natasha!
